characters.name: Miia
characters.description:
__Species:__ Lamia 

She is the first to arrive in Kimihito's ward when the cultural exchange began. She is sweet, naive, and a carefree individual. She has a habit of being clingy when she sleeps. She's very ticklish when one holds the very tip of her tail, which is why Kimihito exploit that weakness in order to get out of her grip.

characters.name: Kimihito Kurusu
characters.description: Ever since the cultural exchange between humans and sub-species begun, he found himself suddenly forced to volunteer in such program where he has to be the custodian of 3 sub-species; namely Miia a lamia, Papi a harpy and Centorea Shianus a centaur, where everyday living with them is an accident waiting to happen.

characters.name: Papi
characters.description:
__Species:__ Harpy

Papi is the second girl to move in with Kimihito after she abducts him and almost dropped him while flying. She has difficulty with words which makes it difficult for Kimihito to understand what she is saying. She's childish, both physically and mentally, despite being as old as Miia.

characters.name: Centorea Shianus
alt_names: セントレア・シアヌス
characters.description:
__Species:__ Centaur

Centorea, also known as "Cerea", is the third resident of Kimihito Kurusu's home. She is very prim and proper, referring to herself as a self-proclaimed knight.
As one of the noble creatures, Cerea is incredibly honorable and chivalrous, while being unerringly loyal to Kimihito. Also, she is somewhat archaic in speech and behavior. Centaurs have strict rules about only letting one's master ride on their backs. She has been shown to be just as possessive of Kimihito as Miia, the difference is that Cerea hides it much better and can seemingly be ashamed of it.
Due to her horse physiology and nature, Cerea's favorite food are carrots. She tries to hide her big appetite for the vegetable because people make fun of her for it.

characters.name: Suu
characters.description:
__Species:__ Slime

A humanoid-like monster who tends to cling onto Kurusu and loves to copy Papi. She can also copy speech word-for-word in the same pitch and tone as others. Can shape-shift to become like other humanoid beings but leaves her distinct traits to distinguish her from the person she copied.   ~!In chapter 13, Suu apparently learns how to speak and confesses her love to Kimihito (Master) in front of the others surprising everyone especially Miia. !~

characters.name: Meroune Lorelei
alt_names: マーラウン・ロリライ
characters.description:
__Species:__ Mermaid

Meroune Lorelei, or Mero for short, is a mermaid bound to a wheelchair. While she is the the fourth girl to officially move in with Kimihito, she is technically the fifth girl to move in with him because Suu is supposed to be the fourth, but she lives there illegally so she doesn't count. Mero has a very warm personality. According to Centaurea, she gets a vibe of royalty from her. As a young girl she had a fascination with the "tragic love" story of Hans Andersen's "The Little Mermaid", and wants to experience it in real life, even to the point of turning into sea foam (She wants to be a lover instead of a bride).   (Source: Monster Musume wikia)

characters.name: Rachnera Arachnera
alt_names: ラチネラ・アラチネラ
characters.description:
__Species:__ Arachne

Arriving to her first host family, the host family did not expect Rachnera to be a Arachne, which caused them to take a disliking to her. When a man offered them money for the rights as her host, they accepted. Being used as a way to make money by producing spider web the man could sell, she ran away from the man. While on the run she kidnapped Kurusu Kimihito, causing the police to search for him and her.

characters.name: Kuroko Smith
characters.description:
Ms. Smith is Kimihito Kurusu’s Cultural Exchange Coordinator. She checks up on Kimihito and his wards on a regular basis, constantly reminding him that any violation of the Cultural Exchange Between Species Bill will result in his arrest and the deportation of the exchange program participants.

Smith's given name is never used in the series and has only been revealed in official merchandise.

characters.name: Zombina
characters.description:
__Species:__ Zombie (formerly Human)

A undead Commander and apart of special task force made up of extraspecies girls, known as MON (Monster of a Neuro).

characters.name: Tionishia
characters.description:
__Species:__ Ogre

Her responsibilities are Guard/Escape duty. Also a member of MON (Monster of a Neuro).

characters.name: Doppel
characters.description:
__Species:__ Shapeshifter (claims to be a Doppelganger)

"Doppel" (real name unknown) is a member of the M.O.N., where she acts as the team's infiltrator. Doppel's default form has the appearance of a small, petite young girl. Her skin is dark, she has very long light-colored hair and black sclera. However, this is not her real form. It's unknown what her real form looks like, but is implied to be very eldritch, being called a "faceless existence". Indeed, Doppel herself admitted that if humans were to see it, "their mind wouldn't be able to handle it". 

Doppel seems to be a natural trickster, taking delight using her powers to prank people and loves seeing people freak out. It is said she often takes jokes too far. However, Doppel prefers to prank those who deserve it, such as criminals, as it is easier to avoid punishment that way. ~!She also seems to have a slightly sadistic side, and is not the most sympathetic of people; almost eagerly letting Smith attack the Orc Leader when she wanted to punish him. (Although, she did have some cause to be peeved with him.)!~

characters.name: Manako
characters.description:
__Species:__ Monoeye

An elite sniper and a part of a special task force made up of extraspecies girls, known as MON (Monster of a Neuro).

characters.name: Lala
characters.description:
__Species:__ Dullahan

Lala is the seventh resident of Kimihito's house. ~!She is the second "D", which she initially denied, telling everyone she's merely there to warn Kimihito Kurusu of his impending death.!~

characters.name: Draco
characters.description:
__Species:__ Dragonewt

Draco is a Dragonewt, a species that is a descendent of dragons. She attacked Miia on her date with Kimihito in a misguided attempt to become friends with her.

characters.name: Lilith
characters.description:
__Species:__ Lesser Devil

Lilith is a Devil who appeared in chapter 21 and episode 10 in anime.

Lilith appears as a young prepubescent girl with dark mocha skin and blue hair. Her iris color is green with black sclera. Her teeth are noticeably pointed like Rachnera's. As a devil, Lilith also has Bat-like wings and two black curved horns that face forward along with a stereotypical spadetail.

Her attire consists of a black and white hooded jacket with a grinning devil on her left breasts, hot pants, thigh high socks and sneakers. Her jacket has zippers on the back to allow her wings to be extended

(Source: Monster Musume Wikia)
